vendor_name: Kimpton Atlantico Algarve, an IHG Hotel
title: Grand Opening: Algarve Coastal Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Poised on Portugal's sunny southern shores, this stylish gem brings soulful luxury to Albufeira's doorstep, just steps from the golden sands of São Rafael Beach. Meander through the sprawling gardens, soak up Atlantic views from the retro-inspired Zénite Rooftop or let Marés tantalise your taste buds with market-fresh fare.

Recharge your spirit in the Wellness Hub with the healing powers of hydrotherapy, sauna rituals and expert massages. From sunrise yoga sessions to bespoke spa journeys, this hotel has perfected the art of blissful escape. Here, Mediterranean greenery and stunning indoor-outdoor spaces create picture-perfect backdrops for lifelong memories.
